Recipes - Roasted Pork Chops
Overview Ingredients Instructions Notes

Ingredients

  • 4 pork chops
  • Olive or vegetable oil
  • 3 cups water (1 cup separated from the other 2)
  • 3 tbsp brown sugar
  • 3 tbsp salt (1 for rub and 2 for brine)
  • 1 tbsp pepper
  • 1 tsp garlic powder
  • 1/2 tbsp chili powder
  • 1/2 tsp onion powder
  • 1/2 tsp cumin
